title: Last year I asked about when Directv would allow Wilmington to get local channels in HD. Part of the answer said they were launching a new satellite at the end of the summer and would have more capacity for local hd markets. Any word on if Wilmington will be getting local hd channels now that the satellite has been put into orbit?
